info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:20AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ALLEGHANY COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...NORTHEASTERN CRAIG COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...NORTHWESTERN BOTETOURT COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...SOUTHWESTERN GREENBRIER...NORTHEASTERN SUMMERS AND NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN WEST VIRGINIA AND THE SOUTHERN CITY OF COVINGTON THROUGH 745 AM EDT... At 719 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oriskany to Fairlea to near Bingham. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Alleghany... Covington... Lewisburg... White Sulphur Springs... Ronceverte... Rainelle... and Alderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
